FlowGraph

Class EdgeStyle

Namespace
FlowGraph.Core.Models
Assembly
FlowGraph.Core.dll

Declarative styling for edge appearance including colors, dash patterns, and effects.

public sealed record EdgeStyle : IEquatable<EdgeStyle>
Inheritance
object
EdgeStyle
Implements
IEquatable<EdgeStyle>
Inherited Members
object.Equals(object)
object.Equals(object, object)
object.GetHashCode()
object.GetType()
object.ReferenceEquals(object, object)
object.ToString()

Examples

// Create a styled edge
var edge = new Edge(...)
{
    Definition = new EdgeDefinition
    {
        // ... connection info ...
        Style = new EdgeStyle
        {
            StrokeColor = "#E53935",
            StrokeWidth = 3,
            DashPattern = EdgeDashPattern.Dashed,
            AnimatedFlow = true,
            FlowSpeed = 2.0
        }
    }
};

// Use a preset
edge.Definition = edge.Definition with { Style = EdgeStyle.Error };

Remarks

EdgeStyle allows per-edge customization of visual appearance without requiring custom renderers. Styles can be applied directly to edges or used as presets.

Common use cases: - Color-coding edges by data type (red for errors, green for success) - Dashed lines for optional/conditional connections - Animated flow to show data direction - Glow effects to highlight active connections

Properties

ActiveFlow

Active/live data flow style (blue with animation).

public static EdgeStyle ActiveFlow { get; }

Property Value

EdgeStyle

AnimatedFlow

Whether to animate the edge with a flowing effect.

public bool AnimatedFlow { get; init; }

Property Value

bool

Bidirectional

Bidirectional communication style (purple, bidirectional flow).

public static EdgeStyle Bidirectional { get; }

Property Value

EdgeStyle

CustomDashArray

Custom dash array when DashPattern is Custom. Values are dash length, gap length, repeating.

public double[]? CustomDashArray { get; init; }

Property Value

double[]

DashPattern

The dash pattern for the edge stroke.

public EdgeDashPattern DashPattern { get; init; }

Property Value

EdgeDashPattern

DataStream

Fast-paced data transfer style (green, fast animation).

public static EdgeStyle DataStream { get; }

Property Value

EdgeStyle

Debug/trace style (pink, visible animation).

public static EdgeStyle Debug { get; }

Pulsing electric style (yellow with glow and animation).

Property Value

EdgeStyle

Error

Error/invalid connection style (red).

public static EdgeStyle Error { get; }

Property Value

EdgeStyle

FlowDirection

Direction of the animated flow.

public EdgeFlowDirection FlowDirection { get; init; }

Property Value

EdgeFlowDirection

FlowSpeed

Speed of the animated flow effect (1.0 = normal, 2.0 = double speed). Only used when AnimatedFlow is true.

public double FlowSpeed { get; init; }

Property Value

double

Gentle

Slow, gentle flow style (light blue, slow animation).

public static EdgeStyle Gentle { get; }

Property Value

EdgeStyle

Glow

Whether to show a glow effect around the edge.

public bool Glow { get; init; }

Property Value

bool

GlowColor

The glow color as a hex string. If null, uses StrokeColor.

public string? GlowColor { get; init; }

Property Value

string

GlowIntensity

The glow intensity/radius (1.0 = subtle, 3.0 = strong).

public double GlowIntensity { get; init; }

Property Value

double

Heartbeat

Fast heartbeat-style pulse effect (red, quick pulses).

public static EdgeStyle Heartbeat { get; }

Property Value

EdgeStyle
